LanguageData.GeneSeed.Name: 40k GeneSeed
LanguageData.GeneSeed.Settings.AstartePunchingPower: Astarte Punching Power: {0}% : [{1}]\nDefault possible in single attack (Punch 15 at 100%)
LanguageData.GeneSeed.Settings.AstarteSpitPower: Astarte Spit Power: {0}% : [{1}]\nDefault possible in single attack (Caustic Spit 80 at 100%)
LanguageData.GeneSeed.Settings.AstarteBodySizeScaler: Astarte BodySize Scaler: {0}% for size of {1}\nNOT Graphical, controls statistical BodySize\nSetting this too low can cause issues with negative food need values!!
LanguageData.GeneSeed.Settings.PostNote: That's all, restart before playing to ensure your change is there. -Alice.\nSource Code Available at https://github.com/Ogliss/AntiLudeonGeneSeed \n Original Source Code Available at https://github.com/alycecil
